description: Work under this contract covers replacement of the existing exterior lighting (wall packs, down lights and pole lights) with new LED luminaires at Mission Medium Institution, 8751 Stave Lake St. Mission, BC.
full_summary:
# Tender Announcement
## External Lighting Upgrade to LED
### Tender Details

**Reference Number:** WS3884237325, Doc3886000413  
**Publication Date:** February 23, 2023  
**Tender Closing Date and Time:** March 9, 2023, 2:00 PM (Eastern Time)  
**Amendment Date:** February 22, 2023  
**Contract Start and End Dates:** April 21, 2023, to October 23, 2023

**Procurement Note:**
This tender has expired.

### Procurement Mandatory Details

- **Contracting Authority:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **Project Owner:** Correctional Service of Canada (CSC)
- **Project Location:** Mission Medium Institution, 8751 Stave Lake St, Mission, BC

### Contract Description

Replacement of existing exterior lighting fixtures (wall packs, down lights, and pole lights) with new LED luminaires at the Mission Medium Institution. The proposed contract is a one-time replacement of the existing lighting system.

### Procurement Details

- **Procurement Method:** Competitive and Selective
- **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
- **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- **Regions of Delivery:** British Columbia, Canada

### Requirement Documents

Please visit [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15499435?extsite=MTU0OTk0MzVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15499435?extsite=MTU0OTk0MzVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) to access the tender document.

### Contact Information

- **Contracting Authority:** Eskicakit, Serdar (SPAC/PSPC)
- **Contact Email:** serdar.eskicakit@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca  
- **Additional Phone and Fax Information:** (Not provided)

**Attachments:**
No attachments are provided with this contract.  
**Additional Notes:** This tender has expired. We are not considering new bids for this project. (PC – May –Jul –24 – modified 009 –bulk)
